thread.title: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial
thread.title_full: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial

title: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial
text: > Entertainment Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial In this courtroom sketch, Judge Allyne Ross presides as Assistant U.S. Attorney Lindsay Gerdes, standing far right, gestures to Vincent Asaro, seated, second from left, in opening remarks at Asaro's federal racketeering conspiracy trial in the $6 million, 1978 Lufthansa cargo heist at John F. Kennedy Airport. Asaro, 80, is flanked by his attorneys, Diane Ferrone, left, and Elizabeth Macedonio. The massive theft, performed by masked gunmen, was immortalized in the film "Goodfellas." (Elizabeth Williams via AP)
